alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bayfield and north central Ashland Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Barksdale, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washburn, Bayfield, Bayfield Peninsula Sea Caves, Sand Island, York Island, Cornucopia, Sand Bay, Red Cliff, Devils Island, Herbster, Apostle Islands National Lake Shore, and Red Cliff Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
